description:
We are given a glimpse into the real reason that Sai plays Angelic Layer. The final match of the Kanto Games commences.
Source: theTVDB.com

titles.title: A Batalha Final! O Última Ataque De Hikaru!
Das große Finale! Hikarus letzter Angriff
La finale ! la dernière attaque de Hikaru.
The Final Match! Hikaru`s Last Attack
決勝戦! ヒカルのラストアタック
